H0.text: Noss, Unst, Lamba and Foula are part of which Scottish island group. Orkney Islands

H1.text: Noss, Unst, Lamba and Foula are part of which Scottish island group. Hebrides

H2.text: Noss, Unst, Lamba and Foula are part of which Scottish island group. Inner Hebrides

H3.text: Noss, Unst, Lamba and Foula are part of which Scottish island group. Ȝetland

A4.text: Noss to the east of Bressay

A6.text: Unst is one of the North Isles of the Shetland Islands, Scotland.

A7.text: Foula (FOO-lə), located in the Shetland archipelago of Scotland, is one of the United Kingdom's most remote permanently inhabited islands.

A8.text: With an area of 12.7 km2 (4+7⁄8 sq mi), it is the eighth largest and most westerly of the Shetland Islands.
